body: At 5th level, a savage warrior gains a +1 bonus on attack and damage rolls with natural weapons. This bonus also applies to CMB and CMD for grappling. This bonus increases by +1 for every four levels beyond 5th. This ability replaces weapon training 1.
name: Natural Savagery
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Fighter/Fighter Archetypes/Savage Warrior/Natural Savagery
